name: Werifesteria
description:
Have you ever been lost in the woods? No?

Are you really sure about that?

--

Werifesteria is a special Darktober Jam collaboration with Bruised Banana, who created this little game inspired by Strayed, our other story about the dark, lonely woods. 

PS: If you find the true ending, take a screenshot of your favourite part of the ending and tag @adventurecow and @bruisedchan on Twitter!

Play time: 5 minutes

Content warning: Mildly disturbing imagery

Cover photo by veeterzy from Pexels https://www.pexels.com/photo/nature-forest-trees-park-38136/
